mapper.insert:
insert into
bxfw_province
bxfw_city
bxfw_county
bxfw_business_hall
(companyCode,orgCode,parentCode,orgName,note,createTime,updateTime,operatorCode,operatorIP) values (#{companyCode},#{orgCode},#{parentCode},#{orgName},#{note},now(),now(),#{operatorCode},#{operatorIP})
mapper.update:
update
bxfw_province
bxfw_city
bxfw_county
bxfw_business_hall
set orgName=#{orgName},note=#{note},updateTime=now() where id=#{id} and companyCode=#{companyCode}

update
bxfw_province
bxfw_city
bxfw_county
bxfw_business_hall
set flag=1,updateTime=now() where id=#{id}

select.if:
select a.id,a.orgCode,a.orgName,a.companyCode,a.note,a.flag from bxfw_province a where a.flag=0 and a.companyCode=#{companyCode}
and a.orgName like CONCAT('${orgName}','%')

SELECT b.id,a.orgCode,a.orgName,b.orgCode as cityOrgCode,b.orgName as cityOrgName,b.companyCode,b.note,b.flag from bxfw_province a RIGHT JOIN bxfw_city b on a.orgCode=b.parentCode and a.flag=0 where b.flag=0 and b.companyCode=#{companyCode}
and b.orgName like CONCAT('${orgName}','%')

SELECT c.id,a.orgCode,a.orgName,b.orgCode as cityOrgCode,b.orgName as cityOrgName,c.orgCode as countyOrgCode, c.orgName as countyOrgName,c.companyCode,c.note,c.flag from bxfw_province a RIGHT JOIN bxfw_city b on a.orgCode=b.parentCode and a.flag=0 RIGHT JOIN bxfw_county c on b.orgCode=c.parentCode and b.flag=0 where c.flag=0 and c.companyCode=#{companyCode}
and c.orgName like CONCAT('${orgName}','%')

SELECT DISTINCT d.id,a.orgCode,a.orgName,b.orgCode as cityOrgCode,b.orgName as cityOrgName,c.orgCode as countyOrgCode, c.orgName as countyOrgName,d.orgCode as hallOrgCode,d.orgName as hallOrgName,d.companyCode,d.note,d.flag from bxfw_province a RIGHT JOIN bxfw_city b on a.orgCode=b.parentCode and a.flag=0 RIGHT JOIN bxfw_county c on b.orgCode=c.parentCode and a.flag=0 RIGHT JOIN bxfw_business_hall d on c.orgCode=d.parentCode and c.flag=0 where d.flag=0 and d.companyCode=#{companyCode}
and d.orgName like CONCAT('${orgName}','%')

mapper.select:
select a.constantCode,a.constanName,a.description from bxfw_constant a where 1=1
and a.constantCode like CONCAT('${constantCode}','%')
and a.constanType=#{constanType}
order by a.constantCode
mapper.update: update bxfw_dept set flag=1,updateTime=now() where deptCode=#{deptCode}
mapper.select:
select b.orgName,a.orgCode,a.deptCode,a.deptName,a.orgType,a.note,a.createTime,a.updateTime,a.operatorCode,a.operatorIP from bxfw_dept a LEFT JOIN
bxfw_province b
bxfw_city b
bxfw_county b
bxfw_business_hall b
on a.orgCode=b.orgCode and b.flag=0 where a.flag=0 and a.orgType=#{orgType} and b.companyCode=1
and b.orgName like CONCAT('${orgName}','%')
and b.orgCode = #{orgCode}
order by a.createTime desc
mapper.update: update bxfw_position set flag=1,updateTime=now() where positionCode=#{positionCode}
mapper.select:
select b.orgName,a.deptCode,a.deptName,c.positionCode,c.positionName,a.note,c.createTime,c.updateTime,c.operatorCode,c.operatorIP from bxfw_position c LEFT JOIN bxfw_dept a on a.deptCode=c.deptCode LEFT JOIN
bxfw_province b
bxfw_city b
bxfw_county b
bxfw_business_hall b
on a.orgCode=b.orgCode where a.flag=0 and b.flag=0 and a.orgType=#{orgType} and b.companyCode=1
and a.deptName like CONCAT('${deptName}','%')
order by a.createTime desc
